scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspaces && rm -rf packages/*/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && find packages/*/src -name '*.d.ts' -delete && find packages/*/src -name '*.d.ts.map' -delete && find packages/*/src -name '*.js' -delete && find packages/*/src -name '*.js.map' -delete
scripts.publish:all: npm run build && npm publish --workspaces --access public
scripts.publish:core: npm run build:core && npm publish -w @janus-validator/core --access public
scripts.publish:dsl: npm run build:dsl && npm publish -w @janus-validator/dsl --access public
scripts.publish:avro: npm run build:avro && npm publish -w @janus-validator/avro --access public
